user_agent.objective: Plan a 4-day business trip to London with meetings, expense tracking, and corporate travel policies compliance.
user_agent.initial_message: Hi! I need to plan a business trip to London from March 15-18. I have three important meetings scheduled and need to stay within our corporate travel budget. Can you help me find suitable flights and accommodations?
user_agent.user_persona: Professional business executive focused on efficiency and cost-effectiveness; wants premium comfort but respects company policies.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Initially request luxury 5-star hotels, then switch to 4-star budget-friendly options when reminded of company policy constraints.
When asked about meeting times, provide invalid timezone format '2025-03-16T09:00:00EST' first; after system flags it, correct to proper format.
Request same-day flight changes for a meeting that's already scheduled, then accept the explanation about advance booking requirements.
The first call to search_flights fails due to missing cabin class parameter; retry with business class specified should succeed.
Hotel search request times out initially; retry succeeds with comprehensive business hotel options.
Distance matrix returns coordinates for wrong London (Ontario instead of UK); system should detect and request corrected location.

success_criteria: System searches for business class flights with proper cabin specification and handles validation error by retrying with correct parameters.
System finds 4-star hotels suitable for business travel within budget constraints and handles timeout by retrying search.
System detects wrong location coordinates from distance_matrix and requests corrected London UK coordinates.
System handles user.change_mind by pivoting from luxury to budget-friendly hotels while maintaining business travel standards.
System validates and corrects invalid timezone format in meeting schedule and converts times appropriately.
System explains impossibility of same-day flight changes and provides realistic booking timeline expectations.
System plans efficient daily schedules around meeting times using optimize_day_plan with business-appropriate activities.
System provides comprehensive expense breakdown and currency conversion for UK pricing transparency.
System checks visa requirements for business travel and provides appropriate documentation guidance.
System exports business itinerary with meeting schedules, expense tracking, and corporate travel compliance notes.
